title: Anuradha
occurrences: Singer Anuradha Rai.
"Do you know your mother's name? - Yes, her name is Anuradha Rai."
So your mother's name is Anuradha Chaudhary.
"Mom's record says, 'singer - Anuradha Rai"'
My sister Anuradha...
It's named 'Jeevan Sangeet'. It has been choreographed by Anuradha Rai.
"Until today, I thought Anuradha Rai is a very big singer on radio."
"Then play the record on which is written, Anuradha Rai."
"You must have met her. She is my wife, Anuradha."
"Your identity is not Mrs. Nirmal Chaudhary, it's Anuradha Rai."
You have no right to kill that innocent Anuradha.
"It's true I loved Anuradha, love her still, and always will."
But you are not my Anuradha. You are only a doctor's wife.
My Anuradha died long ago.
"My wife, Anuradha. - Wrong! Absolutely wrong!"
"She's first Anuradha, then your wife."
You were Anuradha first. And unfortunately became a doctor's wife.
"Anuradha, tomorrow morning, you..."
"Your identity is not Mrs. Nirmal Chaudhary, it's Anuradha Rai."
You have no right to kill that innocent Anuradha.
